meanings.definition: Resembling a hook in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The plant had hooklike thorns for protection.
meanings.sent2: The coat rack had several hooklike protrusions for hanging hats.
meanings.sent3: The hooklike shape of the candy cane made it easy to hang on the Christmas tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was hooklike, drawing people in with its charm.
meanings.sent5: The hooklike clouds in the sky seemed to beckon the approaching storm.
